features: Hydrating Facial Cleanser: This facial cleanser leaves skin feeling clean, soft and cushioned and supports a smoother, more hydrated facial skin texture. This face wash for dry skin hydrates while cleansing to avoid disrupting the skin barrier

Finest Natural Ingredients: This gentle face cleanser is a fragrance-free milky facial wash formulated with snow mushroom, hyaluronic acid and elderflower water. This daily facial cleanser is alcohol-free and suitable as a sensitive skin face wash

Face Skin Care Essential: Our cleanser for dry skin keeps skin from feeling stripped or dry. This moisturizing face wash helps skin feel immediately hydrated and soothed before applying the rest of your facial skin care products

Cruelty-Free and Sustainable: Thayers Milky Hydrating Cleanser is 100 percent cruelty-free and free of any animal ingredients, and we aim to reduce waste by offering recyclable packaging. Paraben, phthalate, oil and gluten-free. Non-Comedogenic
Hydration Infusing: Helps to remove daily buildup, makeup and impurities. The hydrating cleanser is non-drying, non-irritating, and non-tightening. You'll see immediate improvement in skin dryness.
body.description: Thayers Hydrating Milky Cleanser helps skin feel immediately hydrated and soothed while removing makeup and impurities. Skin texture feels smoother after 1 use. The gentle, milky formula, blended with snow mushroom, hyaluronic acid and elderflower water, cushions while cleansing to avoid disrupting the skin barrier, so skin does not feel stripped or dry. Thayers Milky Hydrating Cleanser is 100% cruelty-free and free of any animal ingredients, and we aim to reduce waste by offering recyclable packaging. Paraben, phthalate, oil and gluten-free. Non-Comedogenic. Thayers has committed to excellence with our formulas, featuring classic ingredients we've used for nearly two centuries. Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations, once you use them, you'll know why. Dermatologist Tested*, based on product safety test 2020.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will forever be using this!
reviews.reviewText: First I have to thank the woman who included before & after pictures showing us how miraculously this toner works. It cleans without stripping & calms red irritated skin - my complexion is renewed, I use it every morning. I have noticed it's not as effective at cleaning my pores so once or twice a week before bed I will use either Thayers Rose Petal or Glycolic & Lactic Acids toner & that does the trick. I will be using this Snow Mushroom for as long as I live.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and smooth
reviews.reviewText: I'm a guy, and I went most of my life with nothing on my face but soap. Over the past few years I've started needing some toning and moisturization to keep my skin smooth, and I've tried a lot of things. Most of them are too oily for me, and some of the good oil-free moisturizers are very expensive. Just by chance I ran across Thayers snow mushroom toner, and being big on the benefits of mushrooms, I decided to try it. This product is all I need after cleansing. Don't let the word "toner" fool you, because it also has hyaluronic acid for moisturization. It leaves my skin toned, smooth, and moist without oiliness, and it lasts all day. (I think it is shrinking my eye bags.) My all-in-one solution, and economical! I wish I had found it before wasting all that money trying dozens of different products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best products I have ever used
reviews.reviewText: Very moisturizing. My skin soaked it up very fast, made me feel like I was the crypt keeper before!!! Moisturized all day! Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super light weight product, works great keeps my skin moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product is light, silky, and smooth. It's most definitely worth the money—it feels so moisturizing and cooling on the skin, I'm happy to say that I will be buying this product again. It doesn't burn my skin or make it itch at all, and it clears my pores!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this face wash a lot it makes my skin brighter and softer. i also have sensitive skin so im glad this face wash worked out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Hydrating and Sudsy Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I like my soap to foam up and this does. It is also moisturizing, but thankfully doesn't have much of a scent. Thayers is one of my favorite brands and this foaming face wash does not disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love Thayers toners. My go to for years has been the witch hazel rose petal. Having more mature skin I thought I'd give this a try. I wanted to like it. I tried on damp skin, on mostly dry skin. Tried using more, tried using less. The results were always the same for me, my skin just felt sticky and like it needed washed again. I had better results using at night before bed. Usual make up removing, washing face, pat dry, apply toner. Then let it dry and wait for the stickiness to subside before applying serums and finally a moisturizer. There was always some stickiness left behind that just felt uncomfortable to me. It's Thayers so I'm sure it's a great product for some, it's just not meant for me.

reviews.reviewTitle: My skin looks and feels better!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second bottle of Thayers toner with Snow Mushroom/Hyaluronic Acid. Because the first bottle is almost gone, and I have found that my face looks smoother and well moisturized. I can recommend that it can be used to smooth and moisturize arms, legs, chest. Any exposed skin that I want to look fresher, younger. No annoying scent. My daughters wedding recently took place, and I was told by her cousin whom I have not seen for years, that I looked "stunning". Skin care products matter! I have been around a long time, and have tried many different products. This one really works.

I have the pH balancing aloe cleanser and this one and by far I prefer this one. Leaves my skin feeling 10000000000x more moisturized and smooth and silky using this one and washing it off compared to the other, and the smell of this one just smells so much nicer too being creamy unlike the rubbery plastic smell of the aloe cleanser.No idea if one has different benefits over the other since the other is labeled as pH balancing and this one isnt so I use both, aloe one in the morning with witch hazel tonic and snow mushroom cleanser and toner at night but if I had to chose between the two definitely this one in my books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Smooth, silky, and refreshing, this is a must-use on a daily basis for me now. I gave a bottle to my mum and she was instantly hooked too.

I have dry skin in the winter months. I kid you not, when ever I wash my face with this, it’s as if I don’t even need to moisturize because it leaves my skin feeling smooth, soft & supple. It’s that good! First time buying, this will definitely be a staple in my skin care routine moving forward :)
